communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Jerry Doolittle
communications.communication:
Dear FBI:

This is a request for records under the Freedom of Information Act.

RECORDS REQUESTED

All records related to Jerome Hill Doolittle. He was born on 15 July 1933 in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA. He died on 19 November 2023.

ABOUT THE SUBJECT
Jerry Doolittle served as a press attaché at the U.S. Embassy in Morocco in 1966. His next posting was in 1969 in Vientiane, Laos, during the height of a secret U.S. bombing campaign on suspected North Vietnamese forces and sympathizers in Laos. He later helped disclose the full scope of the bombing campaign. He also worked as a speechwriter for Jimmy Carter. 

FEES

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. If you do decide to charge me fees, please notify me in advance if you anticipate that those fees will exceed $25.

FORM OF PRODUCTION
I would prefer that this request be filled electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

CONCLUSION

Thank you for your timely processing of this request.

Very respectfully,

Nicholas Marritz
